overview: Fred was CTO of Everbee Networks. Fred co-authored more than 10 patents and successfully managed a R&D team of up to 40 engineers. He led in the development of complex security software and hardware platforms, addressing the consumer, industrial and defense market. As the co-founder and CTO of Pepita, Fred is managing the technical developments of Pepita as well as all technical aspects of the companyâ€™s products and platform.
